Reviews.Content: paris reputation poor hotels extortionate prices finding reliable hotel fair price terms parisian prices challenge stumble mercure paris austerlitz you’ve found real gem it’s funky cool trendy comfortable clean modern tv free internet unreliable teacoffee facilities fridge staff friendly helpful executive paris standard size funky designs comfortable beds i’ve stayed hotel couple times stay i’d hesitate choosing hotel marriott price getting hotel denfert nation station metro line 6 easier metro station outside front door supermarket opposite hotel provisions couple eat reasonable prices near hotel 2 minute metro ride breakfast ok continental buffet style
